newsitem.title: USA: Illinova initiated at outperform - Gruntal.
newsitem.headline: Illinova initiated at outperform - Gruntal.

text.p: Gruntal & Co analyst Penelope Adelmann said she initiated coverage of Illinova Corp with an outperform rating, citing prudent total return.
"In the new derugalation of the utility industry, we look at Illinova in two ways," Adelmann said in a research note.
"One is the familiar utility which must provide earnings during the period of transition. The other part is reaching out to take advantage of new opportunities.
"In this way, changes that may negatively affect the utility can be made up, or exceeded, by expansion and development in tehe non-reglated sector of business."
